word_mean: 胆汁质的：根据古希腊的体液学说，具有因黄色胆汁过多而形成的体质的

sentence.Network_en: He was affable at one moment, choleric the next.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一会儿还和蔼可亲，可一转眼就火冒三丈。

sentence.Network_en: Beneath his choleric exterior Gerald O'Hara had the tenderest of hearts.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰拉尔德?欧哈拉的外相虽然凶恨,心里却是再和气不过.

sentence.Network_en: His pride and choleric temper were to ruin him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他生性高傲自恃而又易于发怒,这会毁了他的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... chide ? v. 责备 choleric ? adj. 易怒的，暴躁的 choir ? n. 唱诗班.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... chide ? v. 责备 choleric ? adj. 易怒的，暴躁的 choir ? n. 唱诗班.
迅猛的胆汁质( choleric )；性情活跃、动作灵敏的多血质(sanguine )。人所以会得病，就是由于四种液体失衡加上外界因素影响的结果。
巴甫洛夫在研究中延伸四种性格定义:冷静（phlegmatic）、暴躁（choleric）、乐观（sanguine）、忧郁（melancholic）。巴甫洛夫 …

list.abs: ...次雌雄同体的 deuterohermaphroditic (Correns 1928)次胆酸 choleric acid次第适应性（微生物在培养基中，分次利用二种糖类） diauxy (Monod， 1942).
choleric people don't cry easily or show much emotion at all .暴躁的人不会轻易哭泣，或显露过多的情绪。
choleric temperament 胆汁质choleric type 胆汁质型cholesterol 胆固醇
a choleric outburst ; an irascible response ., 愤怒的爆发 ; 暴躁的反应.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'bilious'): from Old French cholerique, via Latin from Greek kholerikos, from kholera (see choler)

entry.tran: 脾气火爆的;暴躁易怒的
entry.def: A choleric person gets angry very easily. You can also use choleric to describe a person who is very angry.

example.ex: He was affable at one moment, choleric the next.
example.tran: 他一会儿还和蔼可亲，可一转眼就火冒三丈。

sentences.sentence: "men of the choleric type take to kicking and smashing"- H.G.Wells

auth_sentence.content: In person, Pullman isn't quite as choleric as he sometimes comes across in his newspaper essays.
